mapper.select: SELECT a.order_id as revorder_id, a.order_no as revorder_no, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_statusid as revorder_statusid, a.order_userid as revorder_userid, a.order_hometime as revorder_hometime, a.order_addressid as revorder_addressid, a.order_addressprovince as revorder_addressprovince, a.order_addresscity as revorder_addresscity, a.order_addresscounty as revorder_addresscounty, a.order_addressstreet as revorder_addressstreet, a.order_addressconsignee as revorder_addressconsignee, a.order_addressmobile as revorder_addressmobile, a.order_deleted as revorder_deleted, a.order_statusid as revorder_statusid, b.status_id as revstatus_id, b.status_name as revstatus_name, b.status_code as revstatus_code, c.*, d.* FROM lad_rev_order a LEFT JOIN sys_status b ON a.order_statusid = b.status_id LEFT JOIN lad_order c ON a.order_id = c.order_revorderid LEFT JOIN sys_status d ON c.order_statusid = d.status_id where a.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.order_id as revorder_id, a.order_no as revorder_no, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_statusid as revorder_statusid, a.order_userid as revorder_userid, a.order_hometime as revorder_hometime, a.order_addressid as revorder_addressid, a.order_addressprovince as revorder_addressprovince, a.order_addresscity as revorder_addresscity, a.order_addresscounty as revorder_addresscounty, a.order_addressstreet as revorder_addressstreet, a.order_addressconsignee as revorder_addressconsignee, a.order_addressmobile as revorder_addressmobile, a.order_deleted as revorder_deleted, a.order_statusid as revorder_statusid, b.status_id as revstatus_id, b.status_name as revstatus_name, b.status_code as revstatus_code, c.*, d.* FROM lad_rev_order a LEFT JOIN sys_status b ON a.order_statusid = b.status_id LEFT JOIN lad_order c ON a.order_id = c.order_revorderid LEFT JOIN sys_status d ON c.order_statusid = d.status_id WHERE 1 =1
and (b.status_code = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or d.status_code = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and a.order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.order_deleted is null

SELECT a.order_id as revorder_id, a.order_no as revorder_no, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_statusid as revorder_statusid, a.order_userid as revorder_userid, a.order_hometime as revorder_hometime, a.order_addressid as revorder_addressid, a.order_addressprovince as revorder_addressprovince, a.order_addresscity as revorder_addresscity, a.order_addresscounty as revorder_addresscounty, a.order_addressstreet as revorder_addressstreet, a.order_addressconsignee as revorder_addressconsignee, a.order_addressmobile as revorder_addressmobile, a.order_deleted as revorder_deleted, a.order_statusid as revorder_statusid, b.status_id as revstatus_id, b.status_name as revstatus_name, b.status_code as revstatus_code, c.*, d.* FROM lad_rev_order a LEFT JOIN sys_status b ON a.order_statusid = b.status_id LEFT JOIN lad_order c ON a.order_id = c.order_revorderid LEFT JOIN sys_status d ON c.order_statusid = d.status_id where a.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select (count(1) + 1) as serial from lad_rev_order where date_format(order_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into lad_rev_order (order_id, order_no, order_datetime, order_statusid, order_userid, order_hometime, order_addressid, order_addressprovince, order_addresscity, order_addresscounty, order_addressstreet, order_addressconsignee, order_addressmobile, order_deleted) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderHometime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into lad_rev_order
order_id,
order_no,
order_datetime,
order_statusid,
order_userid,
order_hometime,
order_addressid,
order_addressprovince,
order_addresscity,
order_addresscounty,

order_deleted,

mapper.update:
update lad_rev_order
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_datetime = #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_statusid = #{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_hometime = #{orderHometime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressid = #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_addressprovince = #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addresscity = #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addresscounty = #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressstreet = #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressconsignee = #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressmobile = #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_deleted = #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lad_rev_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_datetime = #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_statusid = #{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_hometime = #{orderHometime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressid = #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_addressprovince = #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addresscity = #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addresscounty = #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressstreet = #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressconsignee = #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressmobile = #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_deleted = #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
